Install sysinter

AIX & VIOS

  1. Make this directory
    mkdir -p /usr/local/bin
  2. Copy this
    [[ "$(uname)" = "AIX" ]] && scp taitc118:/prod/images/csi/sysinter.aix5 /usr/local/bin/sysinter.aix5
  3. Then do this
    [[ "$(uname)" = "AIX" ]] && echo "sysinter                40035/tcp" >> /etc/services
  4. Then do this
    [[ "$(uname)" = "AIX" ]] && echo "sysinter        stream  tcp     nowait  root    /usr/local/bin/sysinter.aix5" >> /etc/inetd.conf
  5. Now restart inetd
    [[ "$(uname)" = "AIX" ]] && refresh -s inetd

Linux

  1. Make this directory
    mkdir -p /usr/local/bin
  2. Copy this
    scp taitc118:/prod/images/csi/sysinter.redhat /usr/local/bin/sysinter.redhat
  3. Then do this
    [[ "$(uname)" = "Linux" ]] && echo "sysinter                40035/tcp" >> /etc/services
  4. Then do this
    [[ "$(uname)" = "Linux" ]] && scp taitc118:/prod/images/csi/sysinter-xinetd /etc/xinetd.d
  5. Now restart inetd
    [[ "$(uname)" = "Linux" ]] && service xinetd reload
